Name: Space Sprinter VR
About the game: Game synopsis In the future of 2270, the Earth was a multi-ethnic planet inhabited by various intellectuals. Migrants from all over the universe have gathered on Earth, which enjoys near-infinite resources and energy with the development of technology. The humanitarian Earth coalition government accommodates them all and helps them settle on Earth. However, contrary to the government's intention, the cities where ordinary citizens lived were increasingly complaining and conflicting with them. In the city, a town in which the same tribe lived separately, and the boundaries of the town were divided into large and small disputes every day. To settle disputes, the Earth Federation Government has created a very extreme law of expulsion from the Earth if any act of violence is committed. Instead, it enforces the “running consciousness” bill to settle disputes between races by running, and unconditionally surrenders to the results of running. This seems to have brought peace, but the violence has turned into running, but the conflict has not disappeared. Every town has a fierce struggle to make the best player, and the running race is almost like a war. The player becomes a runner and participates in a death match in which he must win for the town. How to play the game VR running race game Choose from four characters representing each town, Tantaros, Erin, and Marine There are three themes: ground, underwater, and air, and one tracks are provided for each theme. Race on the track and rank in order of arrival first Game features Using VR HMD and controller to provide a real running experience Items obtained on the track can be used in the right place to make the match advantageous Requires individual physical elements and affects the game's win or loss
